main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Baltimore, Maryland. The object was still for a while, then moved slightly over the center of the city.
interesting points: The observation was made using ground radar, indicating a credible method of data collection.
The object was initially believed to be a reflection from city lights by an apartment officer.
The conclusion drawn was that it was probably a balloon, possibly a meteor, or an identified aircraft.
The sighting occurred in 1947, shortly after the famous Roswell UFO incident.
The object changed shape from large to small before disappearing out of the observer's vision.
